answers.answer: Well, I don't have any info on things that affect the outcome of the glucose test...but I just wanted to wish you the best, and tell you not to worry. I bet everything will be just fine and normal for you! It sems we always worry about something going wrong, but in the majority of cases everything is just fine.Good luck!

question: hey all-well i take my glucose test on monday and i am so nervous about it.  Are there any effects that may lead you to get diabetes during pregnnacy? so far everything has been going great so this would really make me sad.  Can i have some reasurance??
title: nervous aobut sugar test
